lead_paragraph: At a Midtown branch of a New Delhi restaurant, surprises are ladled out by an active imagination working in an Indian mode.

headline.print_headline: New Delhi Is Only the Beginning
headline.main: Indian Accent Has a Cosmopolitan Twang

snippet: At a Midtown branch of a New Delhi restaurant, surprises are ladled out by an active imagination working in an Indian mode.
abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant Indian Accent in Midtown Manhattan.
